name: caleb
cooked: A cool project to check out how open source hardware is advancing in construction and architecture design is the http://opensourceecology.org/ movement. They are a group developing tools, machines, and structures that are licensed as CC BY-SA 3.0 and likely would meet the requirements here http://certificate.oshwa.org/ to be self-certified as OSHW. I am sure there are other projects that are utilizing open licensing as well, that was just the first that came to mind
raw: A cool project to check out how open source hardware is advancing in construction and architecture design is the http://opensourceecology.org/ movement. They are a group developing tools, machines, and structures that are licensed as CC BY-SA 3.0 and likely would meet the requirements here http://certificate.oshwa.org/ to be self-certified as OSHW. I am sure there are other projects that are utilizing open licensing as well, that was just the first that came to mind :slight_smile:
